attributes.additional_details:
The government announced that they would more than halve their aid to Yemen. Britain gave £214m in aid in 2020, and this year it will be cutting it to £87m. This is despicable in the middle of a pandemic, when the suffering of Yemenis is getting worse and this could lead to the deaths of hundreds of thousands of children who are already dying of stavation and suffering malnutrition. 

It was also a promise in their party manifesto not to make this cut. This should be debated in parliament.
attributes.background: This petition calls on the government to reverse the cut announced  that the government will more than halve their aid to Yemen.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577527
